name: Saskatchewan.ca
description:
The official website of the Saskatchewan governement.

Goals

Create HTML5 fast and accessible templates to be integrated in Sitecore by the backend team. Different templates are loaded by Sitecore on mobile using the user-agent of the browser.

Tools

  • Node.js - Grunt to preprocess, debug and minify html, stylesheets (LESS) and Javascript
  • Bootstrap 3.0 to manage the responsive aspect, components and grid system of the site

Made at

Blast Radius
